companyInfo.name: Chengdu Nixingde Sports Technology Co., Ltd.
companyInfo.nameEn: Chengdu Nixingde Sports Technology Co., Ltd.
companyInfo.slogan: AI Business Growth Operating System, Your Strategic Growth Partner
companyInfo.sloganEn: AI Business Growth Operating System, Your Strategic Growth Partner
companyInfo.focus: Data Integration · AI Engine · Execution System · Decision Management
companyInfo.subtitle: We provide an AI-driven Business Growth Operating System that transforms proven AI growth paradigms from top global tech companies into deployable core capabilities for any enterprise, achieving predictable, measurable, and sustainable revenue multiplication.

intro: What we offer is an AI-powered Business Growth Operating System. We are not just technology providers, but your Strategic Growth Partners fighting alongside you.

Our mission is: to transform proven AI growth paradigms from top global tech companies into deployable core capabilities for any enterprise, achieving predictable, measurable, and sustainable revenue multiplication.

Built on a four-layer integrated architecture, from data integration, AI engine, execution system to decision management, every layer serves the growth loop, helping enterprises reduce customer acquisition costs by 20%-40%, improve conversion efficiency by 30%-50%, increase customer retention by 25%-45%, and boost revenue growth by 15%-35%.
aboutUs.mission: Transform proven AI growth paradigms from top global tech companies into deployable core capabilities for any enterprise, achieving predictable, measurable, and sustainable revenue multiplication.
aboutUs.vision: Become the world's leading AI business growth service provider and strategic growth partner for enterprises.
values: Equal emphasis on data-driven and intelligent decision-making
Balance between systematic and personalized services
Integration of strategy generation and execution implementation

coreTechStack.title: Core Technology Foundation
coreTechStack.subtitle: Built on three core technology pillars to ensure precision and efficiency of growth strategies

pillars.name: Full-Chain Data Integration Engine
pillars.description: Supports direct integration with enterprise CRM, ERP, e-commerce platforms, marketing tools, user behavior monitoring and other multi-source systems. Through data cleaning, desensitization, and standardization, builds a unified enterprise growth data platform, achieving full-dimensional integration of customer data, transaction data, operational data, and market data, providing high-quality data foundation for AI analysis.

pillars.name: Multi-Dimensional AI Algorithm Engine
pillars.description: Integrates machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing, predictive analysis and other core algorithms to create a dynamically iterating algorithm model library, covering customer profiling, demand forecasting, behavior path analysis, intelligent recommendation, risk identification and other algorithm models, adapting to decision-making needs in different growth scenarios.

pillars.name: Real-Time Intelligent Decision System
pillars.description: Based on data platform and algorithm engine outputs, builds a millisecond-response decision system that can automatically generate growth strategies and synchronize to various enterprise execution terminals, while monitoring strategy execution effects in real-time and dynamically adjusting parameters to ensure continuous optimization of growth results.

systemArchitecture.title: Four-Layer Integrated System Architecture
systemArchitecture.subtitle: An integrated four-layer system where each layer serves the growth loop

layers.name: Business Data Integration Layer
layers.description: Transform all growth-related enterprise data into AI-understandable language. Integrate and unify CRM/ERP/order systems, market placement data, sales behavior data, customer behavior data, customer service/after-sales/delivery data. Through unified data semantic layer, achieve customer full lifecycle view, channel true ROI attribution, and causal mapping of sales behavior and results.

layers.name: Growth Intelligence Engine Layer
layers.description: System brain with core capabilities including: AI growth modeling (automatically establishing customer acquisition → conversion → repurchase → churn causal models), prediction and early warning system (predict revenue 30/60/90 days ahead, automatically identify high-value customers at risk of churning), intelligent decision recommendations (clearly tell enterprises which channels to increase investment, which sales to follow which customers).

layers.name: Business Execution System Layer
layers.description: Bring AI to the frontline, not just AI suggestions, but AI directly driving execution actions. For sales teams: AI automatically generates customer profiles and deal probability, recommends optimal scripts/follow-up rhythm; For market and growth teams: AI automatically allocates budgets to high-ROI channels, eliminates low-performing content in real-time; For customer success teams: predicts renewal probability, automatically identifies upsell/cross-sell opportunities.

layers.name: Management and Decision Layer
layers.description: CEO/management dashboard, upgrade from listening to reports to seeing facts + predictions. Real-time revenue forecasts, growth bottleneck identification, personnel efficiency/channel efficiency/customer efficiency visible on one screen. All core decisions supported by AI simulation results, this is true data-driven management.

coreModules.title: Core Functional Modules
coreModules.subtitle: System forms a growth loop of diagnosis-acquisition-conversion-retention-value enhancement around enterprise performance growth

modules.name: Growth Diagnosis and Attribution Module
modules.description: Through AI algorithms, deeply analyze enterprise historical planning, architecture, processes, performance, operations, daily behaviors and other data to accurately identify performance growth bottlenecks; simultaneously build multi-dimensional attribution models to clarify contribution of different plans, paths, channels, and strategies to performance, providing overall and detailed optimization support for subsequent growth strategy formulation.

modules.name: Precision Acquisition and Traffic Optimization Module
modules.description: Based on customer profiling, achieve precise positioning and segmentation of target customer groups; intelligently match optimal acquisition channels (such as social media, search engines, offline scenarios, etc.), and automatically generate personalized marketing content (copy, posters, video scripts, etc.); monitor traffic quality and acquisition costs in real-time, dynamically optimize channel placement strategies, improve acquisition efficiency.

modules.name: Conversion Path Intelligent Optimization Module
modules.description: For enterprise sales conversion full process (such as consultation-quotation-signing, browsing-adding to cart-payment, etc.), analyze user behavior paths through AI, identify conversion key nodes and churn pain points; automatically optimize conversion process (such as simplifying signing process, optimizing pricing strategy), and provide intelligent customer service, personalized recommendations and other real-time assistance tools to improve conversion rate.

modules.name: Customer Retention and Value Enhancement Module
modules.description: Build customer lifetime value (CLV) prediction model, conduct layered customer operations; automatically generate personalized retention strategies (such as membership benefit customization, repurchase incentives, exclusive service reminders, etc.); simultaneously mine customer cross-purchase and upsell needs, recommend suitable products/services, improve customer lifetime value.

modules.name: Growth Risk Intelligent Control Module
modules.description: Monitor various risks in performance growth process in real-time (such as abnormal fluctuations in acquisition costs, soaring customer churn rates, intensifying market competition, etc.), provide early warnings through AI algorithms; generate risk response strategies to help enterprises avoid growth traps and ensure growth stability.

serviceSystem.title: Full-Cycle Empowerment Service System
serviceSystem.subtitle: Drawing on service models from top global AI business growth companies, build a full-cycle empowerment system of product + service + operation

services.name: Standardized Solution Services
services.description: Provide standardized AI growth solutions for common growth needs of different industries and enterprise scales

packages.name: SME 'Lightweight Growth Package'
packages.description: Focus on core acquisition and conversion links, provide lightweight data integration, basic AI diagnosis, standardized acquisition strategies and tools, quickly help enterprises start AI growth mode, achieve performance improvement at low cost.

packages.name: Medium-Large Enterprise 'Full-Domain Growth Package'
packages.description: Cover full-chain growth links, provide full-dimensional data integration, customized algorithm models, full-domain growth strategy corresponding tools, adapt to complex growth needs of multiple business lines and regions.

packages.name: Industry-Specific Solutions
packages.description: For subdivided industries such as retail, catering, education, manufacturing, internet, etc., create exclusive AI growth solutions and tools based on industry characteristics (such as intelligent product selection and precision marketing for retail, student retention and course renewal improvement for education).

services.name: Customized Growth Engineering Services
services.description: Provide customized growth engineering, tools and workflow construction services for personalized and complex growth needs

process.description: Form dedicated team, deeply engage in enterprise business scenarios, comprehensively sort out business processes, growth pain points, core goals, form customized requirement plan.
Based on requirement research, custom develop exclusive AI algorithm models, data integration plans, growth strategy systems to ensure deep adaptation to enterprise business.
Provide full-process services and tools from system deployment, data connection, model training, strategy launch to personnel training to ensure smooth implementation of customized solutions.

services.name: Full-Cycle Operational Accompaniment Service
services.description: To ensure sustainability of growth effects, provide full-cycle operational accompaniment services, responsible for enterprise revenue growth data

features.name: Real-Time Data Monitoring
features.description: Build exclusive growth dashboard, display core growth indicators in real-time (acquisition cost, conversion rate, repurchase rate, revenue growth speed, etc.), let enterprises clearly grasp growth dynamics.

features.name: Regular Effect Review
features.description: Output monthly/quarterly growth effect analysis reports, summarize strategy effectiveness, locate optimization spaces, provide iteration suggestions.

features.name: 7×24 Hour Technical Support
features.description: Provide round-the-clock technical services, quickly respond to emergencies such as system failures and data issues, ensure stable system operation.

features.name: Continuous Capability Empowerment
features.description: Regularly conduct AI growth knowledge training and system operation training to help enterprise teams improve data-driven growth capabilities.

deliveryModes.title: Delivery Models
deliveryModes.subtitle: Adapt to enterprises at different stages, provide flexible and diverse delivery methods

modes.name: Growth Cloud SaaS Platform
modes.description: Provide ready-to-use standardized AI growth tool sets for growing enterprises, quick deployment, pay-per-performance. Suitable for SaaS, chain, platform-type companies. Features: quick launch, standardized best practices, continuous model evolution.

modes.name: Enterprise-Level Hybrid Deployment
modes.description: Provide hybrid solutions combining cloud AI capabilities with localized data deployment for medium-sized enterprises, balancing capabilities and security. Suitable for medium-large enterprises with clear growth goals, willing to systematically reconstruct growth models.

modes.name: Deep Customization and Co-Creation Solution
modes.description: Establish joint project teams with large enterprises or industry leaders, deeply co-create industry-specific growth AI models, build strategic moats. We are not just 'service providers', but become enterprise 'growth partners', defining industry growth standards together with you.

applicableScenarios.title: Applicable Scenarios and Value Output
scenarios: Enterprises seeking revenue growth and needing new growth breakthroughs
Enterprises with high acquisition costs and low efficiency, needing precise target customer positioning
Enterprises with lengthy sales conversion chains and high churn rates, needing conversion process optimization
Enterprises with low customer retention and weak repurchase willingness, needing customer value improvement
Enterprises with declining operational efficiency after business scale expansion, needing intelligent management tools
Enterprises facing intensifying market competition, needing innovative growth models

valueOutput.title: Enterprise Achievable Value Output
valueOutput.outcome: Ultimately build sustainable intelligent growth capabilities

coreAdvantages.title: Full-Chain Data Integration
coreAdvantages.description: Support integration with CRM, ERP, e-commerce platforms and other multi-source systems, build unified enterprise growth data platform, provide high-quality data foundation for AI analysis.

coreAdvantages.title: AI Intelligence Engine
coreAdvantages.description: Integrate machine learning, deep learning, predictive analysis and other core algorithms, automatically establish growth causal models, provide intelligent decision recommendations.

coreAdvantages.title: Execution System Drive
coreAdvantages.description: AI directly drives execution actions, not just suggestions. Automatically generates strategies and synchronizes to execution terminals, monitors and optimizes in real-time.

coreAdvantages.title: Data-Driven Decision-Making
coreAdvantages.description: Upgrade from listening to reports to seeing facts + predictions. All core decisions supported by AI simulation results, achieving true data-driven management.

team.intro: We have a professional AI business growth team. Team members possess rich business growth practical experience and deep AI technology foundation, committed to becoming strategic growth partners fighting alongside enterprises.
